sentences.en: Farmers all over the globe knowinging the importance and immutability the seasons.
sentences.cn: 全全地球的农民们都明白季节的很重要性和永恒性.

sentences.en: The immutability of God is a strong ground of consolation and encourages hope and confidence.
sentences.cn: 上帝的不变性乃是我们安慰的坚固根基,鼓励我们充满著盼望,信心.

sentences.en: The notion of immutability is also baked into all the reflection and concurrency code.
sentences.cn: 不变性理念也融入了所有映射和并发性代码中.

words.tran_cn: 不变的；不可变的；不能变的
